query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_tests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lessonIdA INT NOT NULL,
  lessonIdB INT NOT NULL,
  trafficSplit INT DEFAULT 50,
  metric ENUM('completion_rate', 'engagement_time', 'quiz_score', 'satisfaction') DEFAULT 'completion_rate',
  status ENUM('draft', 'running', 'paused', 'completed') DEFAULT 'draft',
  results JSON,
  createdBy INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
